Instruction: Cut the pears in half and remove the cores.
Place the pear halves, cut side up, on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
In a small bowl, mix together honey, cinnamon, and melted butter.
Brush the honey mixture over the tops of the pear halves.
Roast the pears in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until tender and caramelized.
Remove the roasted pears from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Serve the roasted pears warm, drizzled with any remaining honey mixture, as a deliciously sweet side dish or dessert.
